title: Este navegador no sincronizo los datos que tengo en firefox otras computadoras
content: Esta es una nueva computadora de mi propiedad, al abrir mi navegador nuevo no sincronizo los datos de otros navegadore Firefox que tengo en otros dispositivos Que puedo hacer? Se supone que firefox automaticamente autualizaria mis datos en este navegador
creator: miguelhumberto

title: Please enable JS and disable any ad blocker
content: Recently I have been unable to go to websites where I have had accounts for years. I can no longer access sites like Chewy, Etsy, and even Pinterst. On the latest failure to sign in to Etsy the message I got is "Please enable JS and disable any ad blocker" I don't want to learn another browser. Please understand I'm a senior so not as savy as you young folks. My Firefox browser is 140.0 so it is up to date
creator: Cruz.mail.01

title: Most add-ons disabled. Changing toggle UI to enable doesn't stick.
content:
I recently noticed that some of my add-ons are not doing their jobs. I looked in about:addons and sure enough, they're disabled. I can flip the toggle to enable them, but if I refresh the page, their state is reverted. I have not found a way to actually enable them.

I pressed the restart button after a pending update then tried everything again without change.

I'm aware that some add-ons can be marked as potentially unsafe or incompatible with the current browser version. That's not the case here. Nothing in the UI indicates there's a problem. Many of the add-ons have the recommended trophy icon. I removed and reinstalled uBlock Origin and Dark Reader. That seemed to fix it for now.
creator: firefox2043

title: Firefox won't start
content: Yesterday, I had Firefox open and running perfectly fine, and I had forgotten to shut down my laptop before closing it. Today, when I reopened my laptop, the Firefox window that was open instantly closed. I tried opening Firefox again, but it kept opening and closing immediately. It would show that there was an open window of it, but the window itself wouldn't open. It would run in the background but never actually open. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but it still did the same thing. Does anyone know a solution to this?
creator: connorjm5045
